ABOUT ME

Let me tell you a little about myself and what i do.

YOUR PROJECT IS IN SAFE HANDS

Hi there, I am Mihai, front end web developer, specializing in JavaScript. I have developed several modern, user friendly websites from scratch, but also, I can manage and update existing projects, or debug them. I am confident with my talent and knowledge which I achieved working on many projects, and continuously learning.I would be happy to offer my experience and transform your ideas into the best possible product suited to your preferences and needs. So, if you're looking for a motivated developer to take the weight of your project off your shoulders and work closely with you to get the job done right, then shoot me a message down below on the contact form or email me at 1mihaisava1@gmail.com !
